g.text: Payer DFSP requests quote from Payee DFSP
Switch forwards quote request to Payee DFSP
Payee DFSP responds to quote request
Switch forwards quote response to Payer DFSP
Switch returns error to Payee DFSP
[Payee DFSP calculation fails or rejects the request]
Payee DFSP returns error to Switch
Switch returns error to Payer DFSP
Switch returns error to Payer DFSP
